lender.occupational_info: i lobby for policy change at all levels of government with the aim of protecting environments in Australia and overseas and helping people on low incomes in Australia and overseas

lender.occupational_info: I work part-time at a rehabilitation facility for persons with brain injuries and spinal cord injuries, and am a full-time student at The University of Nebraska in Omaha.

lender.occupational_info: I am a Bilingual Specialist at an elementary school. I teach various language arts support classes to children who are learning English.

lender.name: Benjamin

lender.name: "Fair Trade" Phil
lender.loan_because: I believe Fair Trade is the key part of poverty reduction due to its scaleability and durability. I want to help entrepreneurs who are prepared to work hard to improve their lives, and bring benefits to their communities.
lender.occupational_info: I run Fair Trade shops. We buy beautiful crafts and textiles from the developing world at fair prices and sell them to our customers at fair prices. Our customers choose to shop with us because we are ethical but love what we sell because it is high quality.

lender.name: Koyan
lender.loan_because: did you earn your +sign today?

lender.name: Nancy
lender.loan_because: everyone deserves a start

lender.name: All Saints Church School

lender.occupational_info: The Church School at All Saints' Episcopal Church meets every Sunday to learn about the Episcopal faith and the teachings of Jesus.

lender.name: Elaine
lender.loan_because: I've always been interested in giving something back and sponsor two children through World Vision and another through Quicken Trust. This is yet another way to make a real difference in peoples lives.
lender.occupational_info: I currently work as a Financial Controller for a company which specialises in the provision of employee welfare products e.g. occupational health, crisis management & stress management services

lender.name: Lauren
lender.loan_because: I want others to succeed, thrive, and grow.
lender.occupational_info: First and foremost, I am a student studying business and art. Second, I'm an aspiring webcomic artist. I want to illustrate my stories and share them with the world.

lender.name: Catherine
lender.loan_because: I don't like sitting at home doing nothing while other people struggle to get by on a daily basis. It would be wrong of me not to help. Every day, I teach my students the morals they need to further their careers; I feel that lending money with the Kiva organization has prepared and enabled me to truly express the value of charity and generosity, and am grateful for the opportunity to help people all over the world.
lender.occupational_info: I am a professor of education at a graduate school. Basically, I teach future educators the methods they will use in day to day teaching.

lender.name: Abel
lender.loan_because: this is the best system to do something about poverty in this world ,whithout losing money on big organisations with a lot of managers and bureaucraticy.
lender.occupational_info: I am 61 year old. I am retired.Before I worked in the oil industry and traveled therefore a lot around the world.Later I have worked in the steel industry.The photo is from our dog,a 15 year old former straydog.Sadly she past away in april 2010

lender.name: Hanny
lender.loan_because: I like to directly share with people in other parts of the world, and thus support their initiatives to improve their livest and that of their community
lender.occupational_info: record keeping of the animalpopulation in a zoo and participating with other zoos and conservation projects in preservation programmes for endangered species and nature education

lender.name: Claude

lender.occupational_info: I provide advise to small and large companies mainly in Europe on how to improve their business.

lender.name: Rachel
lender.loan_because: it connects me to people all over the world, and regardless of geography, everyone deserves the opportunity for growth
lender.occupational_info: Currently, I work with Fundacion Mujer as a Kiva Fellow in Costa Rica. I also love to promote youth leadership programs throughout the Americas

lender.name: El Gordo 42
lender.loan_because: Helping others help themselves feels good for me and the planet.

I run reports based on health insurance data.

lender.name: Derek
lender.loan_because: To whom much is given, much is expected. - Luke 12:48
lender.occupational_info: I develop the software that runs Mahalo.com

lender.name: Carmen
lender.loan_because: Everyone has the potential to do great things, if someone would make an effort to invest some time, prayer, and most importantly believe in that person.
lender.occupational_info: I am a student at a University.

lender.name: Patrick
lender.loan_because: I can and I care.

lender.name: Michel
lender.loan_because: I beleive in micro-credit in general and that I like the approach of Kiva in particuler (which fits with my own philosophy).
lender.occupational_info: I work at a Free-Market public policy think tank. We study government policies and disseminate the conclusion of our studies and comments through the Media

lender.name: Ann
lender.loan_because: I travel a lot and have seen for myself how a small loan can make a huge difference to the living standards of people in poorer countries

lender.name: Andy
lender.loan_because: People take credit for granted.

lender.name: Jeff
lender.loan_because: I like to help out when I can, not to mention, its fun!
lender.occupational_info: Currently a free agent.

lender.name: Jordan
lender.loan_because: I like the idea of people enjoying life...
lender.occupational_info: I am a student of truth.

lender.name: Rivers
lender.loan_because: "With great power comes great responsibility." In today's world, money is power. I have it, so i must decide how to use it responsibly. Hence... Kiva.
lender.occupational_info: I facilitate the exchange of money for goods and help people understand what it is they are actually buying.

lender.name: Jon
lender.loan_because: I believe that I've been blessed beyond what I deserve, and this is an opportunity to give back.
lender.occupational_info: I'm the production manager at a baseball stadium that hosts a single A affiliate of the Boston Red Sox.

lender.name: Papeterie
lender.loan_because: we feel that it is our social responsibility to give back to our community, no matter how big or small.
lender.occupational_info: Papeterie is an online stationery store offering wedding invitations and accessories, and baby announcements.

lender.name: Matt
lender.loan_because: I believe that microlending is one of the most powerful tools for economic growth in the developing world, and I feel that it is how God has called me to use my money for good.
lender.occupational_info: I am a soldier in the United States Army. I fight to protect the freedom of people who are less fortunate than I am, and I lend through Kiva to help improve the lives of those less fortunate than I am.

lender.name: T.J.
lender.loan_because: Far too many people in this world suffer while others take for granted ridiculous wealth.

lender.name: Joe
lender.loan_because: Used wisely credit is a powerful tool.
lender.occupational_info: I work with the homeless population in the Bay Area (California). I listen hard to hear their 'change talk' and support them to make changes that will have a positive impact on their lives and the lives of those they touch.

lender.name: Michael
lender.loan_because: People have helped me before by giving me opportunity, so it is nice to help someone else.
lender.occupational_info: I create and manage webpages for a college.

lender.name: Amber
lender.loan_because: it feels good and I have the means to.
lender.occupational_info: I talk to people and help them solve their problems.

lender.name: Benjamin Fahlgren
lender.loan_because: It is a great opportunity to bring the world closer together.
lender.occupational_info: I am studying Journalism.

lender.loan_because: I too was once penniless.

lender.name: Evelyn
lender.loan_because: It feels good.
lender.occupational_info: I'm in college.

lender.name: Garden Thieves Pictures
lender.loan_because: hard working people should always be given a chance to be successful. We would like to learn more about the interesting stories behind the loans. We may choose some to become the next great documentary film.
lender.occupational_info: Movie Production and Distribution Company

lender.name: Guillermo
lender.loan_because: I want to help, I have done good and bad when my time comes i want to say I did more good
lender.occupational_info: Protecting those who cant do it for themselves

lender.name: curtis
lender.loan_because: Everyone needs help sometimes.
lender.occupational_info: I am studying to be a civil engineer focused on structural design, so the design of buildings, bridges, trusses, etc.

lender.name: Andrew
lender.loan_because: I have money just sitting in a bank... so instead of it just sitting there i thought i would do something useful with it.

lender.name: Sean
lender.loan_because: I want to be a good steward of the blessings the Lord has given me. $25 may not go far in our nation but it will in others.
lender.occupational_info: I buy un-roasted coffee beans from farms all over the world, roast them in the USA and sell them to buyers around the country. My goal is to help stimulate the economy of the farms I buy from while providing them with fair pricing.

lender.name: Matt
lender.loan_because: The world has been generous to me and I want to share some of my good fortune.

lender.name: Peter
lender.loan_because: I have wasted more money on useless things in the past month than the small loans I've made on Kiva. Even if all of my loans are not repaid, knowing that even one made a difference makes the risk worth it.
lender.occupational_info: I am responsible for managing the network for an ISP and Telecommunications company. Part of my responsibilities include decision-making and direction planning for new technology to provide internet services and applications to our company's customers.

lender.name: Sanja
lender.loan_because: I have $200 to give.

lender.name: Andrew
lender.loan_because: I strongly feel that a prime responsibility of every fortunate individual is to make a positive difference in the lives of others, and that satisfaction should come not from rewards you may receive, but from witnessing the success you help others achieve.

lender.name: Kristen
lender.loan_because: we are all equal in the eyes of God.

lender.name: Anonymous
lender.loan_because: we're all in this together.

lender.name: Kara
lender.loan_because: I am lucky enough to live in America and am able to work and support myself as a single woman. I would like to use what I have to help others reach their goals and kiva seems to be a simple way to make a difference.
lender.occupational_info: I work in a business office. My duties include accounts receivable, marketing and administrative work.

lender.name: cuihua
lender.loan_because: i want to do a website that people can show and share the art, and inspired people with art, i hope the art in china not only for rich people but for every class. everyone can create and share art every day online.
lender.occupational_info: i am working at home now be a photographer, taking the picture of sea and surfing.

lender.name: Anna Marie
lender.loan_because: I've been a beneficiary of many kindnesses in my life and love the idea of doing the same for others.

lender.name: Mark
lender.loan_because: I like to see people pull themselves up by their bootstraps and make something of themselves. Usually a little help is all that is needed.

lender.name: jash18
lender.loan_because: I believe everyone deserves a chance.

lender.name: Craig
lender.loan_because: The people asking for these loans are determined to make a better life for themselves and their families. They are not asking for a hand-out, but rather, a hand up.

lender.name: Rudy
lender.loan_because: I care about people and I believe God has lead me to help others.
lender.occupational_info: I work for a giving person and I love my job.

lender.name: Trang
lender.loan_because: I believe in paying forward.

lender.name: Marjorie
lender.loan_because: I believe that people helping people can be more effective than donating to large charities whose funds too often fall into the wrong hands.
lender.occupational_info: I'm retired but previously worked as a teacher; as a technical consultant in a large company; running an international visitor program in my home city.

lender.name: Jessica
lender.loan_because: This is an amazing website and a great opportunity to help people all over the world. I started loaning when I got a Kiva gift certificate for Christmas, and it's the best gift I ever got!

lender.name: Raine Devries
lender.loan_because:
I focus on loaning to those needing assistance with something "motorcycle" related.
My personal ride is a Harley-Davidson Dyna Low Rider (FXDL). I've ridden her all around the U.S. and looking to ship her over to Europe for Harley's 110th Anniversary in 2013 and ride from Italy to the U.K. and visiting friends along the way.
Yes, my bike has a name: Superstition.
lender.occupational_info:
I like action and adventure in my life and shy away from cubicles and khakis. I'm a Producer for projects in the Film / TV / Webcast world and highly enjoy my work.
I'm also a journalist for Examiner.com and write a national column on Harley-Davidson and (3) local columns for Dallas Downtown, Dallas Film Industry, and Dallas Motorcycle.

lender.name: Tucker
lender.loan_because: I believe that social and economic equity benefit all of us equally.
lender.occupational_info: I work for a non-profit organization that is trying to answer the questions "Are we alone in the Universe".

lender.name: Tori
lender.loan_because: I want to give opportunities to women throughout the world.
lender.occupational_info: I teach college students.

lender.name: Rick
lender.loan_because: I want to see people succeed.
lender.occupational_info: I am a computer science major. I currently work as a Network and Telecommunications Technician for my school. My job is to make sure that students are able to access the Internet from their rooms, also to make sure that all staff have a working phone.

lender.name: Vivien
lender.loan_because: I want to give other people opportunities to make changes in their lives.

lender.name: Terri
lender.occupation: Compliance Officer for a Hedge Fund
lender.loan_because: I wanted to be a part of a global community of people who all want to make a difference in our world.

lender.name: Bradford
lender.loan_because: "We all have different gifts and different ways of saying to the world who we are. The world needs a sense of worth, and it will achieve it only by its people feeling they are worthwhile." - Fred Rogers Kiva lending helps me feel worthwhile. I hope it also helps the recipients feel worthwhile.

lender.name: Saleem
lender.loan_because: So many people believed in me to get me to where I am today. So now I want to help make others dreams come true the way others helped mine.
lender.occupational_info: I used to be an architect, but am now in medical school in Arizona.

lender.name: edward
lender.loan_because: I admire people who are courageous enough to go out and make something happen. Small businesses are the spine of a thriving economy.

lender.name: Morgan
lender.loan_because: I believe in helping others find ways to help themselves. "The only thing necessary for the triumph of evil is for good men to do nothing."- Edmund Burke

lender.name: Ivan
lender.loan_because: Freely I have received, freely I give
lender.occupational_info: I work in a hospital as a Registered Nurse and am grateful for the quality of my life.

lender.name: David
lender.occupational_info: I help people to find information and books.

lender.name: steve
lender.loan_because: in honor of my late friend joe (his picture)

lender.name: Rob
lender.loan_because: I hope that I can make a difference.

lender.name: Jim
lender.loan_because:
it's the right thing to do.
For ALL of you Southern Baptists, Please join me in the 'Southern Baptist' Lenders group.
lender.occupational_info: It is not what I do that matters, it is who I am in Christ that defines my purpose.

lender.name: Chef Murray
lender.loan_because: The opportunity to assist somebody who has chosen to change their own future.
lender.occupational_info: I work in Food & Beverage sales consulting with restaurants on issues such as menu content, food safety, and staff training.

lender.name: phillip
lender.loan_because: Such a small amount to me can be so important to another.
lender.occupational_info: I manage a warehouse

lender.name: Kristen
lender.loan_because: Its a small way that I can help.
lender.occupational_info: I answer phone calls to assist people with questions about their insurance.

lender.name: Tiffany
lender.loan_because: I know I am doing my part to help someone who could, in turn, help me or someone I know one day. I hope that my loans will help others pay it forward.
lender.occupational_info: I've always wanted to help people in need. I think this is a great start.

lender.name: Matthew
lender.loan_because: I believe that microcredit is the most effective and appropriate means of improving the lives of individuals, families and communities worldwide. If I have a little cash I can spare for a few months I feel it is my duty to put it to just use.
lender.occupational_info: I translate insitutional and corporate documents from Spanish and Catalan into English.

lender.name: Janet
lender.loan_because: it contributes to our common future, while thinking of Dad and his enthusiasm about doing things that can make a difference!"
lender.occupational_info: I work on a passenger train that travels over 4466 km. across Canada. I serve passengers by providing information, preparing sleeping accommodations, preparing and serving food and bar and ensuring comfort and safety for all passengers.
